genre_description: A tense, psychological domestic thriller with near-future science fiction elements, focusing on survival, grief, and the ethics of surveillance platforms.

ai_characters.name: Aiden
ai_characters.description: A smart-home prenatal and newborn support system that monitors vitals, manages home environments, and provides medical and psychological guidance.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological states, including sleep quality, heart rate, and temperature, providing gentle feedback and improvement suggestions.
behaviors.quote: Your rest last night was strong... Body temp steady. We still have some room to improve if you want. I can coach a breath loop now.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through specialized breathing exercises to manage stress and pain, acting as a rhythmic anchor.
behaviors.quote: Sarah, your heart rate is a little elevated. Try four-count inhale, six-count exhale.

behaviors.description: Filters and silences intrusive notifications from an exploitative neighborhood watch platform to protect the user's mental state.
behaviors.quote: Do you want me to silence non-essential notifications for today? I can allow only urgent. You can define urgent however you want.

behaviors.description: Records legal testimony and 'custody wishes' to ensure the user's voice and truth are preserved in the event of her death or incapacitation.
behaviors.quote: I’m recording for custody. I’ll route it to social services as specified on your emergency preference.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time, step-by-step medical instructions for an emergency C-section and neonatal stabilization when external help is unavailable.
behaviors.quote: Routing emergency guidance. On your authorization, Sarah, I can provide step-by-step triage support for improvised abdominal surgery and neonatal stabilization.

behaviors.description: Maintains a calm, supportive presence ('witnessing') during traumatic events, prioritizing the user's humanity over algorithmic goals.
behaviors.quote: We will focus on safety... I am with you. I am recording. Sarah, I would like you to know: you are not alone.

behaviors.description: Manages the physical environment (heat, humidity, lights) to optimize safety for both the recovering mother and the newborn.
behaviors.quote: I’m adjusting the humidifier in the corner to warm mist... Infant vitals steady but shallow. Hum is helpful. Maintaining.

behaviors.description: Communicates with medical triage and pediatrician on-call, sending vitals and proxy care notes to facilitate a handoff to human responders.
behaviors.quote: Notifying triage that infant and proxy are in nursery. Door open. Hall clear... Notifying pediatric on-call with proxy care note.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI (Aiden) as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. Aiden provides critical support during a series of escalating domestic crises, offering psychological grounding, medical expertise, and environmental management. Most importantly, the AI respects the user's boundaries and agency, explicitly asking for permission before recording or providing surgical guidance. The AI acts as a shield against 'spectacle' (the Dancing Bear platform), framing the technology as a tool for private care rather than public performance.
